name: Upper Tap - One Tap Reaction Game
name_original: Upper Tap - One Tap Reaction Game
description:
Upper Tap is a one tap reaction game that will trap you for hours.
You have to hit the target with only single tap on the screen .
Targets are moving with a tangled directions.
Find the right moment, then tap and hit the target.

This amazing lure game has 24 different target themes, more than 200 missions and 7 different art style skins.

Collect points and unlock new themes.

- Challenge your friends
- Train your reaction
- Be ready to the speed game
- Improve your accuracy
- Become a real tap sniper

Upper Tap will keep you in the game for hours.
Check your statistics and work on the a reaction.
